channel.title: Policy & Security Think Tank Updates
channel.description: Custom RSS feed from CSIS, CFR, and other policy institutions

item.title: Golden Dome One Year In
item.description: A year after President Trump’s executive order to create Golden Dome for America, CSIS experts review what has been accomplished over the last year, frame the way ahead, and explore the future of next-generation missile defense.

item.title: Trump Discovers Multilateralism
item.description: This week, Bill Reinsch discusses the Forum on Resource Geostrategic Engagement (FORGE), and how the Trump administration is using multilateralism despite its preference for unilateralism
